meanings.definition: A rare autoimmune disease characterized by the formation of blisters on the skin and mucous membranes.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with pemphigus after noticing the blisters on their skin.
meanings.sent2: She researched pemphigus online to learn more about the autoimmune disease.
meanings.sent3: Despite its fancy name, pemphigus is not a fun condition to have.
meanings.sent4: The blisters from pemphigus seemed like tiny volcanoes erupting on his skin.
meanings.sent5: The image of blisters caused by pemphigus stuck in her mind like a vivid painting.
